description: Brighten up dinner with this charred turmeric and cauliflower salad. Serve dolloped with creamy yoghurt and drizzled with a sesame and ginger dressing.
name: Charred Turmeric Cauliflower Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: To make sesame & ginger dressing, whisk all ingredients and 2 tsp water in a small bowl until combined. Spread 1 cup yoghurt over platter. Top with cauliflower, herbs and almonds. Dollop over remaining yoghurt and sprinkle with quinoa. Drizzle with dressing and serve.

To make sesame & ginger dressing, whisk all ingredients and 2 tsp water in a small bowl until combined. Spread 1 cup yoghurt over platter. Top with cauliflower, herbs and almonds. Dollop over remaining yoghurt and sprinkle with quinoa. Drizzle with dressing and serve.

To make sesame & ginger dressing, whisk all ingredients and 2 tsp water in a small bowl until combined. Spread 1 cup yoghurt over platter. Top with cauliflower, herbs and almonds. Dollop over remaining yoghurt and sprinkle with quinoa. Drizzle with dressing and serve.
